attributes.action: Move Bahrain closer to the UK in an effort to reduce the cost of air flights to visit Richard Coutts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Maybe, if we cannot obtain cheaper flights to Bahrain, we could attempt to move Bahrain closer to the UK, after all, if Mohammed won't come to the mountain we'll take the horse to water instead,,,or something like that. You are obliged to do something as it's your fault. Act now!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
